changes.removed: Composition: With more attachments than attachment pane height, context menu for adding attachments is unavailable, as we lost extra white-space margin at the bottom (regression) [multiple, many attachments]
changes.added: Composition: With more attachments than attachment pane height, context menu for adding attachments is unavailable, as we lost extra white-space margin at the bottom (regression) and horizontal whitespace is ignored [multiple, many attachments]
